Remove the rowwise grouping of a cubble

Source: R/cubble-helper.R
strip_rowwise.Rd

Remove the rowwise grouping of a cubble

strip_rowwise(data)

Arguments

data

a cubble object

Value

a cubble object

Examples

library(dplyr)
# row number is not properly added since each row is a separate group
climate_aus |> mutate(.id = row_number())
#> # cubble:   key: id [639], index: date, nested form
#> # spatial:  [113.5319, -43.6578, 153.6358, -10.0511], Missing CRS!
#> # temporal: date [date], prcp [dbl], tmax [dbl], tmin [dbl]
#>    id           long   lat  elev name                wmo_id ts         .id
#>    <chr>       <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>                <dbl> <list>   <int>
#>  1 ASN00001006  128. -15.5   3.8 wyndham aero         95214 <tibble>     1
#>  2 ASN00001007  126. -13.8   6   troughton island     94102 <tibble>     2
#>  3 ASN00001018  126. -16.4 546   mount elizabeth      94211 <tibble>     3
#>  4 ASN00001019  127. -14.3  23   kalumburu            94100 <tibble>     4
#>  5 ASN00001020  126. -14.1  51   truscott             95101 <tibble>     5
#>  6 ASN00001025  126. -15.4 385   doongan              94215 <tibble>     6
#>  7 ASN00002012  128. -18.2 422   halls creek airport  94212 <tibble>     7
#>  8 ASN00002032  128. -17.0 203   warmun               94213 <tibble>     8
#>  9 ASN00002056  129. -15.8  44   kununurra aero       94216 <tibble>     9
#> 10 ASN00002064  128. -16.6 164   argyle aerodrome     94217 <tibble>    10
#> # ℹ 629 more rows

# proper id after removing the grouping structure
climate_aus |> strip_rowwise() |> mutate(.id = row_number())
#> # cubble:   key: id [639], index: date, nested form
#> # spatial:  [113.5319, -43.6578, 153.6358, -10.0511], Missing CRS!
#> # temporal: date [date], prcp [dbl], tmax [dbl], tmin [dbl]
#>    id           long   lat  elev name                wmo_id ts         .id
#>    <chr>       <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>                <dbl> <list>   <int>
#>  1 ASN00001006  128. -15.5   3.8 wyndham aero         95214 <tibble>     1
#>  2 ASN00001007  126. -13.8   6   troughton island     94102 <tibble>     2
#>  3 ASN00001018  126. -16.4 546   mount elizabeth      94211 <tibble>     3
#>  4 ASN00001019  127. -14.3  23   kalumburu            94100 <tibble>     4
#>  5 ASN00001020  126. -14.1  51   truscott             95101 <tibble>     5
#>  6 ASN00001025  126. -15.4 385   doongan              94215 <tibble>     6
#>  7 ASN00002012  128. -18.2 422   halls creek airport  94212 <tibble>     7
#>  8 ASN00002032  128. -17.0 203   warmun               94213 <tibble>     8
#>  9 ASN00002056  129. -15.8  44   kununurra aero       94216 <tibble>     9
#> 10 ASN00002064  128. -16.6 164   argyle aerodrome     94217 <tibble>    10
#> # ℹ 629 more rows
